#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
 int a[10005],v[505],w[505];
int t,e,f,i,j,n;
int main()
{
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>e>>f;
		
		f=f-e;
	
		cin>>n;
	
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>v[i]>>w[i];
			if(f==0)
		cout<<"This is impossible."<<endl;
		else
		{
		a[0]=0;
		for(i=1;i<=f;i++)
			a[i]=-1;	
		for(i=1;i<=f;i++)
		{
		
			for(j=0;j<n;j++)
			{
				if(w[j]<=i && a[i-w[j]]!=-1 && (a[i]==-1 || v[j]+a[i-w[j]]<=a[i]))
				{
					a[i]=v[j]+a[i-w[j]];
				}
			}
		}
		if(a[f]==-1)
		 cout<<"This is impossible."<<endl;
		else 
		cout<<"The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is "<<a[f]<<"."<<endl;
		}
		
		
	}
	return 0;
}
